lead_paragraph: Bud Collins, 78, joined ESPN’s tennis coverage a month after his final Wimbledon appearance for NBC. He will participate in ESPN2’s coverage of the Australian Open, the French Open and Wimbledon in 2008. He will report from the United States Open later this month.
